p: 10. The referral-structure of a job (2): the “out-of-which” (τὸ ἐξ οὗ). The thing I produce is not just useful for something. In producing it, I make it out of</> something, which is also included in the referral-structure of the job. Likewise the tools I use. This hammer, for example, is made out of wood and steel, which have a reference to trees and earth, things that naturally “produce themselves” (cf. phusis / ϕύσις) even when cultivated by humans. Hence, in knowing how to use the hammer, nature is also present..
